section.name: s1
section.heading: Interpretation
section.def: appointed date (指定日期) means the appointed date within the meaning of section 45 of the Ordinance;
existing railway (現有鐵路) means an existing railway within the meaning of section 45 of the Ordinance;
railway (鐵路) means the railway defined as such under section 2 of the Mass Transit Railway (Land Resumption and Related Provisions) Ordinance (Cap. 276).

subsection.content: Subject to subsection (2), the parts of the railway specified in the Schedule are exempted from the operation of the Ordinance.

The exemption under subsection (1) shall as from the appointed date cease to have effect in respect of any part of the railway specified in the Schedule, unless that part of the railway is, immediately before the appointed date, an existing railway.
